description:
Make your own story. User-friendly software for LLM roleplaying

RisuAI, or Risu for short, is a cross platform AI chatting software / web application with powerful features such as multiple API support, assets in the chat, regex functions and much more.
- feat: Move aux models setting to models setting page
- feat: Improve OpenRouter experience
- feat: add update reminder feature with postpone options
- test: Inlay functions
- feat: add aws opus 4.5 and 4.6
- fix: make typecheck pass
- feat: Partial Edit (Block/Drag)
- feat: Corrupted Module Lorebook Reset option
- feat: add WaveSpeedAI integration for image generation
- feat: hide jailbreak toggle when no jailbreak prompt exists
- feat: add missing language keys
- ref: Move convertImage/checkImageType out of parser
